original_title: SC concludes hearing of petition seeking to delay Presidential Election
original_body_lines: The hearing of the fundamental rights (FR) petition filed by businessman C.D. Lenawa seeking an order preventing the calling of a Presidential election until the Supreme Court delivers its interpretation on the date of the Presidential poll, and the intervening petitions has been concluded.
Accordingly, the verdict in the case will be announced by the Supreme Court at 12.30 p.m. today.
